title: The New Religion | Guest Host: Jason Whitlock | Guests: Jack Posobiec & Ted Nugent | 12/22/21
description:
The Blaze’s Jason Whitlock guest host the Glenn Beck Program. What are the new religions that have popped up over the past decade? President Joe Biden spoke publicly yesterday about the new Omicron variant, Jason breaks down what it all means. NBA Commissioner, Adam Silver finally comes out and says what half the country has been thinking for nearly two years. Jason brings on Jack Posobiec to speak on Biden’s thanks to Trump about the vaccines. A school board wants to bring back segregation. And American musician Ted Nugent joins to show to talk about the spirituality of hunting. Then Jason takes your calls on thoughts about today's show.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
